description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời bỗng dưng toàn bộ chó trong một thị trấn nọ hóa thành người...Và cô nàng Saki phải sống(vật lộn) với một bé Husky hóa thành trai đẹp XD

description.en:
Based on the 2019 movie "Nezha"  
  
Over a thousand years, spiritual energy of the earth and heavens merged to form a Chaos Pearl. Yuanshi Tianzun refined it into a Demon Pill and a Spirit Pearl.  
  
The Spirit Pearl, which was supposed to be reincarnated into Nezha's body, was stolen by Shen Gongbao and given to the East Dragon King. As such, the Third Prince Aobing, the reincarnation of the Spirit Pearl, was born. Surrounding Aobing is a series of events about growth, and a battle against the Dragons that is beginning.

title.en: Kuro Mahou Ryou no San Akunin

altTitles.ja: 黒魔法寮の三悪人

description.en:
By the Reiwa era, delinquents have been completely eliminated even from schools of magic...or so everyone thought. Even the "Black Magic Dormitory", formerly a wild and out of control place where the dark magic ne'er-do-wells gathered, is now on the verge of being demolished due to no new students having been placed into it for ages. The dorm's poor environment, residents receiving scorn and distain from teachers, and resulting low prospects of employment after graduation made the dorm's popularity sharply drop starting with Gen Z...until this year, when three female students are placed into it! So each of them makes an oath to themselves that they'll escape from the dorm, no matter what happens to the other two! 

However, those girls do not yet know the dreadful prophecy, which will affect the entire magical world, that is descending upon them.

(Source: Shogakukan)
description.ja:
ヤンキーは魔法学校でも絶滅寸前！

時は令和。かつてワルが集い荒れた【黒魔法寮】も、入寮者が途絶え廃寮寸前。だが今年の入寮生はなんと女子が3人！環境劣悪、先生に忌み嫌われ、卒業後の就職率も低い。黒魔法寮の現状を見た彼女達は、それぞれ胸に誓う。ここから脱出するのだ――他の2人はどうなってもいいから！

title.en: When The System Opens After The Age Of 100, All Grandchildren Kneel Upon The Mountains!

altTitles.zh-ro: Bai Sui Kai Xitong, Xiaozi Xiansun Gui Man Shan!

altTitles.en: Opening the System at a Hundred Years Old, Filial Children and Virtuous Grandchildren Kneeling All Over the Mountain!

altTitles.pt-br: Quando O Sistema Só Se Ativa Depois De 100 anos

description.en: Xiao Chen, a time-traveler nearing the age of one hundred, was peacefully preparing to spend the rest of his life. Suddenly, a system activated, rewarding him for his family’s childbirth. Not only would he become stronger, but his lifespan would also reverse! “Procreate, quickly procreate!” he exclaimed. “Everyone in the family, regardless of age or gender, give birth, give birth, give birth!”
description.pt-br: Xiao Chen, um viajante do tempo com quase cem anos, preparava-se pacificamente para passar o resto de sua vida. De repente, um sistema foi ativado, o recompensando pelo parto de um novo descendente. Ele não apenas se tornaria mais forte, mas sua expectativa de vida também seria revertida! “Procrie, procrie rapidamente!” ele exclamou.

description.en:
When I bought a mountain, I never expected it to be from another world!
And while I was leisurely enjoying a countryside life suited to this strange realm, I unknowingly began making the mountain more powerful!?

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)
description.ja: 山を買ったら、それがまさかの異世界だったなんて！ しかも異世界仕様の田舎暮らしをのんびり楽しんでいたら、知らぬ間に山をパワーアップさせていて!?

altTitles.vi: Spica, Hình Phạt và Tội Ác

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。
description.vi:
Câu chuyện xoay quanh Hatori, một giáo viên tại trường cấp 3 và là người có cuộc sống rất đỗi bình thường. Một ngày nọ, anh nhận ra rằng học sinh mà mình chủ nhiệm, Tsumugi Spica đang bị bạn cùng lớp bắt nạt.
Những tưởng đây chỉ là một cô bé nhút nhát, nhưng...

description.en: Akira Azuma is a tall, attractive, but aloof Kusunoki High School freshman girl and all-around athlete. Hiyori Motohashi is a short Kusunoki freshman girl in the school's broadcasting club. While trying to set up coverage on Akira, Hiyori finds herself attracted to Akira's mysterious charm.
description.pt-br: Azuma Akira é alta, tem boa aparência, é boa em todos os esportes, e é o centro das atenções no momento da escola Kusonoki. Motohashi Hiyori é uma caloura no clube de jornalismo da escola Kusunoki. Sua primeira tarefa no clube é entrevistar Akira, ela se encanta pelo jeito misterioso de Akira e decide que vai conseguir entrevistá-la de qualquer jeito! … Será que ela vai conseguir?

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

description.en: Delinquent student Torao is tired of losing to the school's top dog, Inuzuka Ryouhei. One day, before his latest challenge, Torao accidentally drinks something from a vending machine that turns him into a girl! Worse yet, Inuzuka has fallen completely head over heels for her! What will Torao, now Torako, do to change back and ward off Inuzuka's advances?

title.en: Breaking Into the Body of the Emperor's Daughter

description.en:
After transmigrating to another world as a wealthy young master, Su Changqing only wanted to live a low-profile life as a rich second-generation heir and enjoy his days in comfort. However, his plans are suddenly disrupted when his family faces an unexpected crisis, and he accidentally discovers the Emperor's secret - that she is actually a woman.

While he initially feared the female Emperor would stop at nothing to silence him, to his surprise, she instead becomes interested in his mysterious ability to transform his appearance. She wants him to become her male body double. What Su Changqing never expected was that being the female Emperor's male substitute would mean he has to visit the imperial harem on his very first day. His peaceful life completely falls apart from that moment on...
What if the tragedy behind Imperishable Night wasn't uncalculated?

altTitles.es-la: La profecía de la princesa de la destrucción

description.en: A "dragon" appears from a container that fell in front of Dazai Ryunosuke's eyes. The disastrously beautiful "dragon," Rinne Irako, had been condemned to death as a world-destroying calamity, and was being transported to a place of refuge. Rinne Irako was sentenced to death and transported. But as fate would have it, the "dragon" girl had a miraculous encounter with a boy, and her destiny was about to change drastically.
description.ja: 世界を滅ぼす災厄とされ死刑判決を受けた伊良子燐音は、移送中の事故によって太宰龍之介と出逢うこととなる。人類滅亡を防ぐための方法はなんと……「伊良子燐音と太宰龍之介が【ケッコン】すること」!?
description.es-la: En un mundo al borde de la catástrofe, Ryuunosuke Dazai se convierte en el protagonista de una historia intrigante. Su encuentro con Rinne Irako, una figura deslumbrante y peligrosa, desencadena un giro de los acontecimientos. Rinne, condenada a muerte por su naturaleza caótica destinada a destruir el mundo, es trasladada bajo estricta seguridad. Sin embargo, un encuentro fortuito con Dazai despierta una chispa de esperanza en ambos. Juntos, se embarcan en una trascendental travesía para detener el cataclismo inminente y salvar la existencia. Enfrentando desafíos y sacrificios, descubren el poder del amor mutuo como su arma más poderosa contra la destrucción. Guiados por un propósito superior, se unen para proteger y preservar el mundo que aman, demostrando la capacidad humana de trascender la oscuridad y encontrar redención a través del amor.

description.pt-br: Yuusuke, um trabalhador de escritório comum encontra-se com seu amigo em uma reunião, apenas para descobrir que o mundo da moda o deixou para trás. Agora, com a ajuda de sua irmã Tamaki, Yuusuke deve entrar no mundo das tendências e do carisma

The Hellish Romantic Adventure of Apprentice Angel Yu Dante. 

Pre-Serialization work.
#Fantasy #Action #Worldbuilding #SuperpowerBattleSeries #ShonenRoyalRoad

Gensokyo's border is finally starting to fail and everything is being erased. All the strongest beings (from up to Phantasmagoria of Flower View) in the world are gathered. To gain the means and chose the one to recreate the world and the border, a battle royale is held.  
  
Part of [Touhou](https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=touho) series.

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

test

description.de:
Von dem Ersteller von be***l***iebten Ser***i***en wie ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto und Detergent kommt die Serie Test, eine preisgekrönte rom***a***ntische Komödie über einen Highschoo***l***-Waffenmeister namens Yugi, der die ganze We***l***t bereist und alle Life Notes sammelt, damit er eines Tages die Leiche seines Bruders bergen kann, nachdem er das Taboo erfüllt hat, den Titan, den wir an dem Tag mit seinem Stand gesehen haben, zu one-punchen und zum Nokage-Piratenkönig zu werden -datteba***y***o. Schauen Sie zu, wie er mit seinem Onii-Chan und generischen ***H***arem Mädchen durch das He***i***lige Reich von Bri***t***annia streift, während sie alle Widrigkeiten mit der Kraft der Freundschaft, ***L***iebe und... (warum knall***e***n sie sich nicht einfach gegenseitig.) In diesem Epos in Spielfilmlänge, was das von Gilgamesch und der Ilias konku***r***riert, werden wir die Mentalität und Soziologie dieser gesellschaftlichen Bedrohungen erforschen, während sie die Erde in ihrem nie stillbaren Durst nach Imoutos verwüsten.

Rezensenten geben dieser Serie eine 10/10 für die unkonventionelle Darstellung des Magical Girl Genre.
Nominiert für die 1. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den schlechtesten Manga des Jahres.
Gewinner der 2. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den besten Manga des Jahres.
Der beste Manga aller Zeiten, wie Meichiro Noda feststellte.

---

**Hinweis:** Bitte fügen Sie *KEINE* Genre hinzu, oder der Test Manga wird die Suche verschmutzen. Weil dieser Manga die reinste Form aller Manga ist [Der Plural von Manga ist Manga].
**Fun fact:** Im Jahr 127, als dieser Manga ursprünglich veröffentlicht wurde, hieß er "Taest", aber wurde wegen den amerikanischen Druckkosten pro Buchstabe zu "Test" verkürzt.

description.en:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda

---

**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật Webtoon  Na Kang Lim

altTitles.pt-br: Personagem de Webtoon: Na Kang Lim

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.
description.vi: Na Kang Lim, nam sinh trung học bình trường rất thích đọc webtoon. Một ngày, đã có chuyện bất ngờ xảy ra, nữ chính từ bộ webtoon cậu hay đọc đã xuất hiện ngoài đợi thật. Những sự cố trong webtoon khiến cô ấy rơi vào khủng hoảng, nhưng nhân vật chính lại không có ở đây để giải cứu nữ chính! Và Kang Lim đã trở thành nhân vật chính cùng với kí ước từ bộ truyện và khả năng du hành thời gian để cứu nữ chính
description.pt-br: Na Kang Lim, um estudante do ensino médio que gosta de ler webtoons, vivencia um evento estranho um dia, quando a protagonista de seu webtoon favorito aparece diante dele. Mais surpreendente ainda, os mesmos incidentes que a colocam em perigo no webtoon começam a acontecer na vida real. O problema é que, no mundo real, não há um protagonista para salvá-la! No fim, Na Kang Lim assume o papel do protagonista, voltando no tempo para salvá-la.

altTitles.ja: 俺は大魔導士だ！

description.en:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)

description.fr:
La planète a été envahie par des monstres, que seuls les sorciers peuvent chasser. Notre héros, simple humain, n'a pas vraiment d'autre choix que de jouer le rôle d’appât dans les chasses s’il veut un salaire décent. Mais un jour, blessé par une de ces créatures et sur le point de mourir, il se rappelle sa vie antérieure… en tant que roi des sorciers, rien que ça ! Armé de ses souvenirs et de ses nouveaux pouvoirs, sa vie devrait vite devenir intéressante.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)

description.ja:
10年前、次元が拗れてモンスターが溢れ出た。 同時に生まれたモンスター覚醒者たちは→モンスターを捕まえて大活躍をする。 「吉澤覚」は月に4回、お母さんの病院代を工面するために 覚醒者のハンティングを手伝って、 後処理をする危険千万の「ポーター」として活動をする。 そんな中でモンスターに大きな怪我を負ってから前世の記憶が戻ってくる… ”ん？俺死んだのか？” ”俺は前世に大魔導士のクラトゥラスだったじゃん！！” 前世の記憶を持った「吉澤覚」のパワハラ魔法が始まる！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)

description.ko:
10년 전, 차원이 비틀리며 몬스터가 쏟아져 나왔다.
동시에 생겨난 초능력 각성자들이 몬스터를 잡으며 대세가 되는데...

성훈은 한 달에 네 번, 어머니의 병원비를 마련하기 위해
각성자의 사냥을 돕고, 뒤처리하는 위험천만한 '짐꾼'으로 활동한다.

그러던 중 몬스터에게 큰 부상을 입고 전생을 기억하게 되는데...

"어라, 나 죽었나?"

"나 전생에 대마도사 크라투라스였잖아!!!"

전생의 기억을 가진 성훈의 갑질 마법이 시작된다!!

*********************
판타지 화제작 데카스펠 작가님의 <나는 마도왕이다> 본격 웹툰화!
세계를 휩쓰는 마도왕의 마법을 웹툰으로 만나 보세요!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)

description.ru:
10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун, нуждающийся в деньгах из-за болезни своей матери, берёт опасную работу, помогая охотиться на этих монстров четыре раза в месяц в качестве приманки. Но однажды, оказавшись тяжело раненным, он вспомнит свою прошлую жизнь.  
«Я что, только что умер? Погоди-ка, я был королём-волшебником Кратра в прошлой жизни?!»

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)

description.pt-br:
10 anos atrás, a horda de monstros da fenda formada da distorção do tempo e espaço iniciaram um ataque contra a humanidade. Ao mesmo tempo que, as pessoas começaram a despertar poderes e iniciaram uma caçada aos monstros em busca de fama e dinheiro. Lee SungHoon, à procura de dinheiro devido à doença de sua mãe, arruma um trabalho altamente perigoso, ajudando na caçada desses monstros bancando a isca para os caçadores, fazendo isso quatro vezes no mês. Mas, um dia, ele é gravemente ferido por um monstro e relembra de sua vida passada como o Rei dos Feiticeiros. "Hã? Eu acabei de morrer? Espera aí, eu era O Rei dos Feiticeiros Kuratauras na minha vida passada?" Com as memórias de sua vida anterior, o espetáculo do poder mágico esmagador de SungHoon se inicia.   

---

altTitles.ja: スーサイドガール

description.en:
At first glance, Kirari Aokigahara appears to be an average, happy-go-lucky first-year high school student. But instead of running late for school one day, she finds herself running late for a meeting at Seaside Cafe hosted by Lucio, the admin of a website called Suicide Cafe.

The sparkling, charming young lady stands out amongst the gathering's cast of suicidal individuals. She joins the group in swallowing sleeping pills and entering a car filled to the brim with toxic charcoal smoke. However, rather than dying, she wakes up from a dream about a girl's suicide and is surprised to see that the once-suicidal group appears to be revitalized. Upset that she did not die, Kirari goes home and attempts to kill herself, only to realize that she cannot die, no matter the method.

Lucio then appears to tell Kirari that she has been chosen to save people from ending their lives, including the girl in her dream earlier, and become a magical girl of salvation—a "Suicide Girl."

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal~〈Fan Colored〉

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

description.en: Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

altTitles.ja: こまどりは、夜の帷

altTitles.en: Robin in the Veil of Night

description.en: Police officer Norito, accompanied by his brother Shinji, a folklorist, travel to a small village deep in the mountains in order to investigate a series of suspicious deaths. The village chief, Yoshiomi, a striking man also serving as a Shinto priest, offers them a place to stay. However, within this estate, lies a secret...

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner

altTitles.th: เจ้าสุนัขตัวโตรังแกเจ้านายอีกแล้ว

description.en:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

altTitles.en: Please Marry Me With Divorce in Mind

altTitles.ja: 結婚しよう。離婚前提で。

altTitles.vi: Cậu có thể kết hôn với tôi nhưng vẫn sẵn sàng cho việc ly hôn được không?

description.en:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?
description.vi:
Sau khi bước sang tuổi 30 với tư cách là một NEET, Kyosuke bị đuổi khỏi nhà bố mẹ.

Đó là lúc Rui, người bạn thân nhất của anh, đưa ra một giải pháp: kết hôn rồi ly hôn!

Một chàng trai và cô gái 'chỉ là bạn bè' trong khoảng một thập kỷ quyết định bước vào một cuộc hôn nhân giả.

Anh là một người lãng mạn và cô chỉ là một cô gái thực dụng. Một cặp đôi hoàn toàn không thích hợp với hôn nhân.

Họ sẽ khám phá được điều gì sau 100 ngày bên nhau?
description.pt-br:
Depois de completar 30 anos como NEET, Kyousuke foi expulso da casa de seus pais.
Foi então que Rui, o seu melhor amigo, propôs uma solução: casar e depois divorciar-se!

Um rapaz e uma moça que são “apenas amigos” há cerca de uma década decidem entrar em um casamento de mentira.
Ele é um romântico e ela é apenas uma garota pragmática. Um casal inadequado para o casamento.
O que eles descobrirão depois de 100 dias juntos?

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.

altTitles.ja: あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。
「あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。」異世界おっさん教師 突然のモテ期に困惑する

altTitles.ja-ro: "Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.": Isekai Ossan Kyoushi Totsuzen no Moteki ni Konwaku suru

altTitles.zh: 那个时候被你拯救了的那个魔物娘是我的说。

altTitles.vi: Cô bé ấy là con quái vật mà tôi đã cứu lấy năm xưa

description.en: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、軍を退役してから約20年。主人公は未だ独身で、もう40代も半ば。Eランクの落ちこぼれ教師として生活するある日、彼の学園にエリートの「モンスター娘」が転校してくるのだった。。
description.vi: Câu chuyện về một ông giáo trung niên (trước đây là một anh hùng) ở dị giới tình cờ gặp lại cô học trò vốn dĩ là con bạch tuộc cute phô mai que mà anh từng cứu giúp và dạy dỗ trước đây.
description.pt-br: Cerca de 20 anos se passaram desde que o protagonista foi convocado para outro mundo e se aposentou do exército. Ele ainda está solteiro na casa dos 40 anos e vive como um professor de baixo escalão, até que um dia, uma 'garota monstro' de elite é transferida para sua classe.

title.en: Warui ga Watashi wa Yuri ja nai

altTitles.ja: 悪いが私は百合じゃない

altTitles.en: Sorry, but I’m Not into Yuri

altTitles.zh: 虽然很抱歉但我不是百合

altTitles.zh-hk: 雖然很抱歉但我不是百合

altTitles.zh-ro: Suīrán hěn bàoqiàn dàn wǒ bùshì bǎihé

description.en: In an attempt to win her homeroom teacher's heart, Itsumi Toudou purchased a shady love potion, and tested it out on her stuck-up student committee president, Yomotsuka. Now, she has an uncharacteristically affectionate girl to deal with, and she's not even a lesbian! Right?
description.es: Em uma tentativa de ganhar o coração de seu professor de sala de aula, Itsumi Toudou comprou uma poção do amor sombria e a testou em sua presunçosa presidente do comitê estudantil, Yomotsuka. Agora, ela tem uma garota estranhamente afetuosa para lidar, e ela nem é lésbica! Certo?
description.ja: 担任の男性教師に恋をしている藤堂いつみは、ある日いけないサイトで惚れ薬を入手し、担任に飲ませようとする。しかし、真面目で堅苦しい美人学級委員長やヤンキー女子に飲まれてしまったから、さあ大変！
description.pt-br: Numa tentativa de conquistar o coração de seu professor, Itsumi Toudou comprou uma poção do amor suspeita e a testou em Yomotsuka, a presidente do conselho estudantil. Agora, ela tem de lidar com uma menina estranhamente afetuosa, e aquela nem sequer é lésbica! Ou será que não?

title.en: On My Way To See My Mom

altTitles.en: On the Way to Meet Mom

description.en:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
description.ko: 폐가에서 발견된 아이 '모리'는 구조대에 의해 보호소에서 눈을 뜬다. 익숙하지 않은 생활에 적응하던 어느 날 후원자에게 조건 없는 사랑을 받고 자라는데.. 친하게 지내던 친구가 엄마와 떠나고, 엄마라는 존재가 있다는 걸 알게 된 아이는 생각한다. 혹시 이 사람이.. 나의 엄마가 아닐까? 모리의 멀고도 험한 엄마 만나러 가는 이야기.

title.en: After 100,000 Years of Training in a Super Difficult Dungeon, I Became the World's Strongest ~The Weakest Incompetent Gains the Upper Hand~

altTitles.ja: 超難関ダンジョンで10万年修行した結果、世界最強に ～最弱無能の下剋上～

description.en: "The most incompetent person in the world ". Kai Heinemann received this gift at the age of 13. The effects of the gift resulted in Kai's significantly reduced physical abilities, and he became despised and bullied in the gifted supremacy of Lamour. Kai is forced to leave his home and is attacked on his way to the royal capital, and while desperately running away, he wanders into a dungeon. In the dungeon, he had to clear the "Trial of the Gods" to get out, and the time did not progress. Kai, feeling like he was going to die, spent 100,000 years clearing the dungeon. In the process of clearing the trial of the gods, Kai becomes the most powerful being in the world, gaining unique and strong friends along the way.
description.ja: 【この世で一番の無能】・・・13歳でこのギフトを得たカイ・ハイネマンは、ギフトの効果で身体能力が著しく低くなる。周囲からのいじめにより国を去ることになったカイは、旅の途中で「神々の試練」を与えるダンジョンに迷い込んでしまい――？

altTitles.ja: 2世と器

altTitles.vi: Tín Đồ Và Vật Chứa Của Thần Linh

description.en:
High school student Haruichi Higashi is a second generation religious person whose mother is obsessed with a new religion.
One day, Haruichi is taken by force to a meeting by his mother, and is shocked to see that the "Light Master" who appears is his classmate, Eishin Saihara.
Eishin, who he has never spoken to at school, is like a god here, and is worshipped without regard for his personality.
And that night, Haruichi witnesses Eishin, who is single-mindedly dragging a kerosene tank toward a religious facility! ?

It was a strange encounter between Eishin, who has been pushed to his limits both physically and mentally by the adults around him, and Haruichi, who is by his side.
description.vi: Higashi và Eijima là bạn cùng lớp nhưng chẳng bao giờ Higashi để ý đến cậu bạn ít nói đó. Cho đến khi Higashi bị mẹ ép đến một buổi "cầu nguyện" của các tín đồ tôn thờ vị thần Ánh Sáng, cậu bất ngờ nhận ra Eijima là Thống chủ của giáo phái này. Dù chỉ là thoáng qua, nhưng Higashi biết Eijima đang bị cưỡng ép. Làm thế nào để giúp Eijima tìm lại tự do và câu chuyện tình yêu giữa hai người bạn này sẽ phát triển thế nào? Mời bạn theo dõi câu chuyện nhé.

title.en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
Kuroiwa Medaka is Proof Against My Cuteness

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!! しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

description.en:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

altTitles.ja: 悪の華道を行きましょう

altTitles.en: Let's Go on the Evil Runway

altTitles.hu: Nem sétálunk le kézen fogva a gonoszság virágos útján?

altTitles.id: Akankah kita berjalan begandengan tangan di jalan kejahatan yang berbunga?
Mari kita berjalan sembari bergandengan turun ke jalan kejahatan yang berbunga-bunga

altTitles.pt-br: Vamos andar de mãos dadas pelo caminho florido para a maldade?

altTitles.es: ¿Caminamos de la mano por el camino florido del mal?

altTitles.th: เส้นทางปีศาจที่งดงามนั่นน่ะ จะไปด้วยกันดีไหม?

description.en: Celestine, the villainess, suddenly recalls her memories of her past life when she's at the altar, about to be married off to a Prime Minister twice her age and surrounded by the most awful rumours as a punishment for her misdeeds against the Prince and his lover. She realizes that this is the world of an otome game she played in that previous life, but more importantly than that, she also inherits past life's very specific tastes...
description.ja: 王子に捨てられた美貌の悪役令嬢セレスティーヌ。醜い禿げデブオヤジといやがらせ婚の最中……突然よみがえる前世の記憶…！ そして…あれ!? でもなんかこの人…悪くない。ちょっと素敵かも……？ 悪女として、そして枯れ専として、我が道を行くセレスティーヌの華道をご覧あれ！
description.pt: Celestine, a vilã, de repente se lembra de suas memórias de sua vida passada quando ela está no altar, prestes a se casar com um primeiro-ministro com o dobro de sua idade e cercada pelos mais terríveis rumores como punição por seus crimes contra o príncipe e seu amante. Ela percebe que este é o mundo de um jogo otome que ela jogou naquela vida anterior, mas mais importante do que isso, ela também herda gostos muito específicos da vida passada…

altTitles.ja: 鈍色のカメレオン

altTitles.fr: De nous il ne restera que des cendres

description.de: Ende der Achtzigerjahre steht Japan am Abgrund einer nie dagewesenen Wirtschaftskrise. Während Profitgier und Skrupellosigkeit das Land regieren, begibt sich eine junge Frau auf einen blutigen Rachefeldzug. Doch die düstere Vergangenheit der hübschen Killerin ist nicht ihr einziges Geheimnis, denn hinter Lippenstift und Minirock verbirgt sich in Wahrheit ein Mann…
description.en: During the Japanese Asset Price Bubble, everyone, men or women, young or old, lived in a world that was filled with frenzy. In the air where strength overruns weakness, there is a "woman" who tries to avenge her past. But, there's a twist with this "woman". One is that she was a cold killer. Second is that this "woman" is actually a man.
description.fr: Elle apparaît tantôt comme une jeune femme docile qui ferait tout pour son amoureux, tantôt comme une provocante reine de la nuit ou même encore dans la peau d'une lycéenne aguicheuse qui séduit son prof... Sa méthode est toujours la même: mettre sa cible en confiance pour ensuite l'éliminer prestement et sans état d'âme. Et, au fait, elle, c'est lui! Yû est un tueur impitoyable qui, tel un caméléon, se déguise en femme pour mieux ferrer ses victimes. Yû agit pour le compte d'une organisation mafieuse tout en espérant par là même occasion retrouver l'assassin qui a massacré sa famille! Seul indice: le tueur porte à l'épaule un tatouage de fleur de chrysanthème. Soyez certains que ce tueur aux multiples visages, fera tout ce qu'il faut pour se venger du seul être dont il désire intensément la mort!

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

title.en: Jitsu wa Imouto deshita. ~Saikin Dekita Giri no Otouto no Kyorikan ga Yatara Chikai Wake~

altTitles.ja: じつは義妹でした。～最近できた義理の弟の距離感がやたら近いわけ～

altTitles.en: She Was Actually My Stepsister.: Recently, the Sense of Distance Between Me and My New Stepbrother Is Incredibly Close

altTitles.id: Dia Sebenarnya Adik Perempuanku ~Baru-baru ini, Jarak Antara Diriku dan Adik Laki-lakiku Semakin Dekat~

altTitles.ru: На самом деле она была моей сводной сестрой

altTitles.es-la: En realidad era mi hermanastra ~Recientemente, la sensación de distancia entre mi nuevo hermanastro y yo es increíblemente cercana~

description.en:
Akira, my stepbrother, was brought into my life as a high school student after my parents remarried. He is a cute boy but shy because of the complicated family environment he grew up in. I had a crush on my brother, so I always spent time playing with Akira for his sake... He loves me... We hit it off, and the distance between us grew rapidly! I asked him, "......Brother, do you like me by any chance?" "Of course I do."

The misunderstanding between the two of us deepens. And finally, I realized that Akira was my "sister" and I was confused... "I like the distance between my brother and me as we have always been. I'd rather be with you more than I am now." Akira's approach to me, aiming to make us "lovers" instead of "siblings", has begun!
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official Raw Light Novel](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202111jitsuimo)
description.ja: 親の再婚で、高校生の俺にできた義理の弟・晶。複雑な家庭環境で育ったせいで、美少年だけど人見知り。兄「弟」に憧れていた俺は、晶といつも一緒に遊んで過ごしていたけど、じつは俺たちは兄「妹」だと判明し…!?
description.es-la: ¿Una relación secreta entre un hermano y su hermana pequeña? ¡Comienza una comedia romántica entre hermanos con un malentendido! Akira, mi hermanastro, llegó a mi vida después de que mis padres se volvieran a casar. Es un chico lindo pero tímido debido al entorno familiar donde creció. ¡Nos llevamos bien, y le pregunté: "Hermano, ¿te gusto por casualidad?" "Por supuesto que sí". El malentendido entre los dos se profundiza. Y finalmente, me di cuenta de que Akira era mi "hermana" y me confundí... El acercamiento de Akira a mí, con el objetivo de convertirnos en "amantes" en lugar de "hermanos", ¡ha comenzado! ¡Una coqueta comedia romántica con una hermana pequeña que es demasiado linda y despreocupada!
description.pt-br:
***Um relacionamento secreto de irmão mais novo com sua irmã mais nova?! Começa uma comédia romântica entre irmãos com um mal-entendido!**

Akira, meu meio-irmão, entrou em minha vida quando era estudante do ensino médio, depois que meus pais se casaram novamente. Ele é um menino fofo, mas tímido por causa do ambiente familiar complicado em que cresceu. Eu tinha uma queda pelo meu irmão, então sempre passava um tempo brincando com Akira por causa dele…. Ele me ama… Nós nos demos bem e a distância entre nós cresceu rapidamente! Eu perguntei a ele,
"Mano, você gosta de mim por acaso?"
"Claro que sim."
O mal-entendido entre nós dois se aprofunda. E finalmente, percebi que Akira era minha “irmã” e fiquei confuso...
"Gosto da distância entre meu irmão e eu, como sempre estivemos. Prefiro estar com você mais do que estou agora."
A abordagem de Akira para mim, com o objetivo de nos tornar “amantes” em vez de “irmãos”, já começou!
Uma comédia romântica sedutora com uma irmã mais nova que é muito fofa e despreocupada para ser irmão!

title.en: Smoke Blue no Ame Nochi Hare

altTitles.ja: スモークブルーの雨のち晴れ

description.en: Sakutaro's former colleague and No. 1 sales rival, Shizuka Kuji, saved him from danger when he was out having a good time one night.When Kuji left the company a step earlier than Sakutaro, he looked at him with envy, thinking that he must have a brilliant second career now.But when Kuji reunites with Sakutaro for the first time in eight years, his sarcastic personality is still the same, but for some reason, he is now working as a translator, looking languid and with long hair...

altTitles.ja: 東京エイリアンズ

description.en: Gunji Akira, who has just started high school, has been chasing after his father's ghost by trying to become a police officer just like him. One day however, he has a surprise encounter with an alien while leaving school. And there begins the start of his fateful adventures with extraterrestrial life…
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời, Gunji Akira, một học sinh trung học bình thường đã đặt chân lên toa tàu định mệnh; và từ đó, cuộc đời cậu đã thay đổi hoàn toàn. Câu chuyện gay lọ à nhầm gay cấn đã bắt đầu~

title.en: It’s Time to Change the Genre

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre

description.en:
I woke up inside my favorite novel. 

Not as the protagonist, Luca Winterwald, but as Judith, his abusive aunt and the first character to die — time for a rewrite! 

I’ll hand Luca off to his loving, long-lost uncle as scripted, and then live my own life far from danger. At least, that was the plan. When his uncle arrives, Luca suddenly calls out, “Don’t leave!” 

Now, I must protect Luca from impending family tragedy, raise him to become the hero, and turn this villainess’s ending upside down!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9E%A5%EB%A5%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%B0%94%EA%BF%94%EB%B3%B4%EB%8F%84%EB%A1%9D-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2494)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/I-Will-Change-the-Genre/3487)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74301)

altTitles.ja: 伽藍の姫 -がらんのひめ-

description.en:
A world where the machine civilization has perished and immortal monsters called "Monotsuki" are rampant. 
Isana, a girl born in a remote village, meets an android who lost her memories and looks exactly like her sister, who should have disappeared in the ruins she wandered into. 
Convinced that her sister is alive, Isana gives the mechanical person the name "Hime" ("Princess") and they set out together on a journey to find her sister.
description.ja: 機械文明は滅び、「モノツキ」と呼ばれる不死の怪物がはびこる世界。辺境の村に生まれた少女・イサナは、迷い込んだ遺跡で失踪した姉によく似た、記憶を持たない機械人と出会う。「姉が生きている」と確信したイサナは、機械人に「ヒメ」という名前を与え、ともに姉を探す旅へ出る。廃墟と自然、異形の怪物。

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Phiêu Lưu Kỳ Bí của JoJo Phần 9: The JOJOLands

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?
